title: Diane Abbott – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson and Rishi Sunak Being Fined for Breaking Rules
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Diane Abbott, the Labour MP for Hackney North and Stoke Newington, on Twitter on 12 April 2022.
content: While people were struggling with illness and lockdown, ministers were partying. While people are struggling with the cost of living they were tax dodging. Of course they should resign.
